title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 126.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 126.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following terms shall have the following meanings: (a) Beneficiary means the entity for whose sole benefit the trust has been established. The trust agreement shall contain a provision that includes within the term beneficiary any successor of the beneficiary by operation of law, including, without limitation, any liquidator, rehabilitator, receiver or conservator. When established in conjunction with a reinsurance agreement, the beneficiary is the licensed ceding insurer. (b) Grantor means the entity that has established a trust for the sole benefit of the beneficiary. When established in conjunction with a reinsurance agreement, the grantor is the unlicensed, unaccredited reinsurer. Notes
